text: alm tanzur 'iilaa almnafqyn, yaqulun li'iikhwanihim fi alkufr min yahud bani alndyr: layin 'akhrajakum muhamad wman maeah min mnazlkm lanakhrujana mekm, wala nutie fikum ahdana abdana salana khidhlankm 'aw tarak alkhuruj mekm, walayin qatalukum lneawnnkm elyhm? wallah yashhad 'iina almunafiqin lakadhibun fima waeadwana bih yahud bani alndyr
